item.title: NFS Server: A Complete Guide to Setting Up and Configuring
item.description: Introduction: Are you looking for a way to share files between multiple machines in a network? #comments NFS (Network File System) may be just what you need! In this guide, we’ll walk you through the process of setting up and configuring an NFS server on Linux.Here are the step-by-step instructions for setting up an NFS server and client on different machines: Step 1: Install the NFS package: On the machine that will be the NFS server, install the NFS package.
